\begin{document}
\maketitle
\nwfilename{src/guess.nw}\nwbegindocs{1}\nwdocspar

\begin{abstract}
  In this game, you pick a number from $1$ to $100$, and the computer has to
  guess it.
\end{abstract}

% \tableofcontents
% \newpage

\section{Outline}

\marginnote{%
  As the name suggests, this chunk gets tangled into
  \href{https://github.com/yurrriq/land-of-lisp/blob/master/src/guess.lisp}{{\Tt{}src/guess.lisp\nwendquote}}.
}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{2}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}}\moddef{src/guess.lisp~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
\LA{}reset the global state~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}}\RA{}

\section{Example Session}

After loading {\Tt{}\LA{}src/guess.lisp~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}, you might have {\Tt{}\LA{}a session~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2aJKj5-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote} like this:

\begin{marginfigure}
\begin{minted}{shell-session}
$ rlwrap sbcl --load src/guess.lisp
\end{minted}
\end{marginfigure}

% \begin{minted}{lisp}

> (\nwlinkedidentc{start-over}{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1})
50
> (\nwlinkedidentc{smaller}{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1})
25
> (\nwlinkedidentc{bigger}{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1})
37
> (\nwlinkedidentc{bigger}{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1})

40

% \end{minted}


\section{Defining the Small and Big Variables}
\label{sec:top-level-defs}

To give the computer a range of numbers in which to guess, we define the lower
and upper limits, {\Tt{}\nwlinkedidentq{*small*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}\nwendquote} and {\Tt{}\nwlinkedidentq{*big*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}\nwendquote}, respectively. We'll need to
{\Tt{}\LA{}reset the global state~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote} as such whenever we want to restart the game,

\marginnote[1.5\baselineskip]{%
  \say{Global variable names should start and end with asterisks (also known in
    this context as earmuffs)} \citep{google-style-guide}.
}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{6}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}}}\moddef{reset the global state~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}\\{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(defparameter \nwlinkedidentc{*small*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1} 1)\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{*small*}}{*small*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}
(defparameter \nwlinkedidentc{*big*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1} 100)\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{*big*}}{*big*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}\\{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}}\nwidentdefs{\\{{\nwixident{*big*}}{*big*}}\\{{\nwixident{*small*}}{*small*}}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{7}\nwdocspar

\section{Defining the Guess-My-Number Function}
\label{sec:guess-my-number}

With {\Tt{}\nwlinkedidentq{*small*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}\nwendquote} and {\Tt{}\nwlinkedidentq{*big*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}\nwendquote} defined, we can tell the computer how to guess a
number ({\Tt{}\nwlinkedidentq{guess-my-number}{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}\nwendquote}) within those limits.

The basic algorithm is to
{\Tt{}\LA{}halve the sum of the limits and shorten the result~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2ma7VI-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}.
To achieve that, we use Common Lisp's
\href{http://www.lispworks.com/documentation/HyperSpec/Body/f_ash.htm}{\lsp{ash}}
function to perform an {\sl arithmetic right shift} by $1$, i.e.
$\floor{\cee{sum} \times 2^{-1}}$.

\begin{marginfigure}%
  \vskip -3\baselineskip
  \caption{The guessing algorithm}
  \begin{minted}{c}
sum <- small + big
right shift sum by 1
return sum
  \end{minted}
  \label{fig:guessing-algorithm}
\end{marginfigure}

To {\Tt{}\LA{}define the \code{}guess-my-number\edoc{} function~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}, we simply implement the
algorithm described in pseudocode in \Fref{fig:guessing-algorithm}.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{8}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-2ma7VI-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2ma7VI-1}}}\moddef{halve the sum of the limits and shorten the result~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2ma7VI-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(ash (+ \nwlinkedidentc{*small*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1} \nwlinkedidentc{*big*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}) -1)
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}}\nwidentuses{\\{{\nwixident{*big*}}{*big*}}\\{{\nwixident{*small*}}{*small*}}}\nwindexuse{\nwixident{*big*}}{*big*}{NW3pAW7b-2ma7VI-1}\nwindexuse{\nwixident{*small*}}{*small*}{NW3pAW7b-2ma7VI-1}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{9}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{10}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}}}\moddef{define the \code{}guess-my-number\edoc{} function~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(defun \nwlinkedidentc{guess-my-number}{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1} ()\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{guess-my-number}}{guess-my-number}{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}
  \LA{}halve the sum of the limits and shorten the result~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2ma7VI-1}}\RA{})
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}\nwidentdefs{\\{{\nwixident{guess-my-number}}{guess-my-number}}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{11}\nwdocspar

Now, when we want to {\Tt{}\LA{}have the computer guess a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}, we simply call
{\Tt{}\nwlinkedidentq{guess-my-number}{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}\nwendquote} as follows.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{12}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}}\moddef{have the computer guess a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-2xfHu8-1}\\{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}\\{NW3pAW7b-4Yu8C-1}\\{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}\\{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(\nwlinkedidentc{guess-my-number}{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1})
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-2xfHu8-1}\\{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}\\{NW3pAW7b-4Yu8C-1}\\{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}\\{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}}\nwidentuses{\\{{\nwixident{guess-my-number}}{guess-my-number}}}\nwindexuse{\nwixident{guess-my-number}}{guess-my-number}{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{13}\nwdocspar

\section{Defining the Smaller and Bigger Functions}

\marginnote{%
  To appropriately adjust {\Tt{}\nwlinkedidentq{*big*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}\nwendquote},
  {\Tt{}\LA{}subtract one from the most recent guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2xfHu8-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}.
}

\begin{marginfigure}
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{14}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-2xfHu8-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2xfHu8-1}}}\moddef{subtract one from the most recent guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2xfHu8-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(1- \LA{}have the computer guess a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}\RA{})
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{15}\nwdocspar
\end{marginfigure}

To {\Tt{}\LA{}define the \code{}smaller\edoc{} function~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}, we need to update the global state
such that the next guess is {\em smaller} than the last, i.e.
{\Tt{}\LA{}set \code{}*big*\edoc{} to one less than the last guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote} then
{\Tt{}\LA{}have the computer guess a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{16}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}}}\moddef{set \code{}*big*\edoc{} to one less than the last guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(setf \nwlinkedidentc{*big*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1} \LA{}subtract one from the most recent guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2xfHu8-1}}\RA{})
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}}\nwidentuses{\\{{\nwixident{*big*}}{*big*}}}\nwindexuse{\nwixident{*big*}}{*big*}{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{17}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{18}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}}}\moddef{define the \code{}smaller\edoc{} function~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(defun \nwlinkedidentc{smaller}{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1} ()\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{smaller}}{smaller}{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}
  \LA{}set \code{}*big*\edoc{} to one less than the last guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}}\RA{}
  \LA{}have the computer guess a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}\RA{})
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}\nwidentdefs{\\{{\nwixident{smaller}}{smaller}}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{19}\nwdocspar

\marginnote{%
  To appropriately adjust {\Tt{}\nwlinkedidentq{*small*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}\nwendquote},
  {\Tt{}\LA{}add one to the most recent guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-4Yu8C-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}.
}

\begin{marginfigure}
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{20}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-4Yu8C-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-4Yu8C-1}}}\moddef{add one to the most recent guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-4Yu8C-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(1+ \LA{}have the computer guess a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}\RA{})
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{21}\nwdocspar
\end{marginfigure}

To {\Tt{}\LA{}define the \code{}bigger\edoc{} function~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}, we need to update the global state
such that the next guess is {\em bigger} than the last, i.e.
{\Tt{}\LA{}set \code{}*small*\edoc{} to one greater than the last guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote} then
{\Tt{}\LA{}have the computer guess a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{22}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}}}\moddef{set \code{}*small*\edoc{} to one greater than the last guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(setq \nwlinkedidentc{*small*}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1} \LA{}add one to the most recent guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-4Yu8C-1}}\RA{})
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}}\nwidentuses{\\{{\nwixident{*small*}}{*small*}}}\nwindexuse{\nwixident{*small*}}{*small*}{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{23}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{24}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}}}\moddef{define the \code{}bigger\edoc{} function~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(defun \nwlinkedidentc{bigger}{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1} ()\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{bigger}}{bigger}{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}
  \LA{}set \code{}*small*\edoc{} to one greater than the last guess~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}}\RA{}
  \LA{}have the computer guess a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}\RA{})
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}\nwidentdefs{\\{{\nwixident{bigger}}{bigger}}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{25}\nwdocspar

\section{Defining the Start-Over Function}

At this point, to {\Tt{}\LA{}define the \code{}start-over\edoc{} function~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote} is trivial:
we simply {\Tt{}\LA{}reset the global state~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote} then
{\Tt{}\LA{}have the computer guess a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}\RA{}\nwendquote}.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{26}\sublabel{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}}}\moddef{define the \code{}start-over\edoc{} function~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
(defun \nwlinkedidentc{start-over}{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1} ()\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{start-over}}{start-over}{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}
  \LA{}reset the global state~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}}\RA{}
  \LA{}have the computer guess a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}}\RA{})
\nwused{\\{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}\nwidentdefs{\\{{\nwixident{start-over}}{start-over}}}\nwendcode{}

\nwixlogsorted{c}{{a session}{NW3pAW7b-2aJKj5-1}{\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-2aJKj5-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{add one to the most recent guess}{NW3pAW7b-4Yu8C-1}{\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-4Yu8C-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{define the \code{}bigger\edoc{} function}{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}{\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{define the \code{}guess-my-number\edoc{} function}{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}{\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{define the \code{}smaller\edoc{} function}{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}{\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{define the \code{}start-over\edoc{} function}{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}{\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{halve the sum of the limits and shorten the result}{NW3pAW7b-2ma7VI-1}{\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-2ma7VI-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-1qZadw-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{have the computer guess a number}{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}{\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-KaMxC-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-2xfHu8-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-4Yu8C-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{reset the global state}{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}{\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-23Nold-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-2jBlyk-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{set \code{}*big*\edoc{} to one less than the last guess}{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}{\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-3ZMSnf-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{set \code{}*small*\edoc{} to one greater than the last guess}{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}{\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-3Xjyma-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-3lVgmB-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{src/guess.lisp}{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}{\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-1LAszg-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{subtract one from the most recent guess}{NW3pAW7b-2xfHu8-1}{\nwixd{NW3pAW7b-2xfHu8-1}\nwixu{NW3pAW7b-2BE8xK-1}}}%
